entry.value: [{"style":"max-width: 700px;","controlId":"P3_C4_","text":"Rapid page panels also have the option to be set as a footer! This will make the page panel stick to the bottom of the page at all times, as long as the page contents make sense for it to do so. In the event of a busy page the footer will be placed below the page contents. Moving back to the page footer, ordinarily in a case like this we would set the page footer to be a simple page as well, however we have had to change the rules slightly. The page panel has some CSS applied to it to allow for this hint, which is referenced in from the dedicated footer page, to maintain it's position without affecting the layout of the page. Any hint content specified on a simple page will be ignored when being referenced through a page panel.","type":"hover"}]

{"controlHints":[{"style":"max-width: 700px;","controlId":"P3_C4_","text":"Rapid page panels also have the option to be set as a footer! This will make the page panel stick to the bottom of the page at all times, as long as the page contents make sense for it to do so. In the event of a busy page the footer will be placed below the page contents. Moving back to the page footer, ordinarily in a case like this we would set the page footer to be a simple page as well, however we have had to change the rules slightly. The page panel has some CSS applied to it to allow for this hint, which is referenced in from the dedicated footer page, to maintain it's position without affecting the layout of the page. Any hint content specified on a simple page will be ignored when being referenced through a page panel.","type":"hover"}]}
